changes.change: arm64e support
Minor fixes for compatibility mode.
Added a compatibility mode to support environments with tweaks like Bazzi or BatteryPercentX. Can be enabled in settings.
Added support for portrait upside down orientation.
Improved notification content handling.
Fixed a bug where the low battery alert would not show up with certain configurations.
Fixed a bug where notifications would become unresponsive in landscape mode.
Fixed a bug where the original charging message would not show up on the lock screen.
Fixed notifications not having a margin with large banners enabled on iOS 12.
Internal fixes.
iOS 12 support.
Fixed a crash with notifications on iOS 12.
Fixed a bug where text color would not be applied correctly in combination with Palette (e.g. black text on black background).
Added initial support for Palette.
Banner size can now be adjusted.
Moved notification settings to a separate page.
Fixed a bug where notifications wouldn't show the name of the app.
Revised settings icon.
Notifications now respect preview settings.
Fixed a bug where notifications would still be affected even after disabling the notification feature.
Added support for notifications (beta).
Added the option to set a custom charging message.
Added a settings icon (Thanks to AS_Aeneon!).
The indicator now always has enough time to animate before the lockscreen fades out.
Fixed an issue that caused high CPU usage.
Fixed a bug where the indicator would get stuck on the top left in certain configurations.
Initial release.
